00051

00054

00057 
00058 ! Effective volume and radius
00059  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: invInitVol
00060 
00061 ! Define constants used in the code (inv6 = 1/6, inv12 = 1/12, invPi = 1/pi)
00062  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: inv6  = 0.16666666666666666667D0
00063  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: inv12 = 0.08333333333333333333D0

00094  MODULE LBMParams
00095  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00096  IMPLICIT NONE
00097  SAVE
00098 
00099 ! fdim = order parameter distribution dimension - 1 (D2Q5)
00100 ! gdim = momentum distribution dimension - 1 (D2Q9)
00101  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: fdim = 4
00102  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: gdim = 8
00103 
00104 ! Distribution functions
00105  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:,:) :: f, g
00106 
00107 ! D2Q5/D2Q9 Lattice speed of sound (Cs = 1/DSQRT(3), Cs_sq = 1/3, invCs_sq = 3)
00108  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Cs       = 0.57735026918962576451D0
00109  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Cs_sq    = 0.33333333333333333333D0
00110  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: invCs_sq = 3.00000000000000000000D0
00111 
00112 ! Distributions weights (D2Q9: Eg0 = 4/9, Eg1 = 1/9, Eg2 = 1/36)
00113  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg0 = 0.44444444444444444444D0
00114  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg1 = 0.11111111111111111111D0
00115  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg2 = 0.02777777777777777778D0
00116 
00117 ! Modified distribution weight (to avoid operations: EgiC = Egi*invCs_sq)
00118  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg0C = 1.33333333333333333333D0
00119  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg1C = 0.33333333333333333333D0
00120  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg2C = 0.08333333333333333333D0
00121  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Eg0T, Eg1T, Eg2T
00122 
00123  END MODULE LBMParams

00134  SAVE

00137  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: TAG1 = 1, TAG2 = 2, TAG3 = 3, TAG4 = 4
00138 
00139 ! Communication parameters
00140  INTEGER :: nprocs, proc, vproc

00142  INTEGER :: east, west, north, south, ne, nw, se, sw, MPI_COMM_VGRID

00144  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: mpi_dim = 2

00147  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: f_west_snd, f_east_snd

00153 
00154 ! Information exchange buffers (y direction)
00155  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: f_south_snd, f_north_snd
00156  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: f_south_rcv, f_north_rcv
00157  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: g_south_snd, g_north_snd
00158  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: g_south_rcv, g_north_rcv
